mapper.select: select aptCode, buildYear, roadName, roadNameBonbun, roadNameBubun, roadNameSeq, roadNameBasementCode, roadNameCode, dong, bonbun, bubun, sigunguCode, eubmyundongCode, dongCode, landCode, apartmentName, jibun, lng, lat from `houseinfo` where dongCode = #{dongCode} order by aptCode;

select C.dealId, A.dong, A.dongCode, A.jibun, A.apartmentName, A.aptCode, A.lng, A.lat, C.dealYear, C.dealMonth, C.dealDay, C.dealAmount, C.area from (select distinct aptCode, dong, dongCode, apartmentName, jibun, lng, lat from houseinfo where dongCode = #{dongCode}) as A left join (SELECT dealId, aptCode, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, dealAmount, area from (SELECT distinct dealId, aptCode, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, dealAmount, area, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY aptCode ORDER BY dealYear DESC, dealMonth DESC, dealDay DESC) AS rn FROM housedeal where aptCode in (select distinct aptCode from houseinfo where dongCode = #{dongCode})) as B where rn = 1) as C on A.aptCode = C.aptCode order by C.dealId desc;

select dealId, dealAmount, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, cancelDealType, aptCode from housedeal where aptCode = #{aptCode} and dealYear = #{year} and dealMonth = #{month} order by dealId desc;

select distinct substring_index(t.dongName, ' ', 1) as dongName from (select distinct sidoName, gugunName, dongName from dongcode where sidoName = #{sidoName} and gugunName like concat(#{gugunName}, '%') and dongName is not null order by dongName) t;
